name: Unusual Scientist
description:
An unusual scientist girl who kills zombies with School Material Guns

Made for Weekly Game Jam in 5 days

It is very unfinished and I dont had very much time to work on it

Please use the fullscreen mode

Hope you like this cute game

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

E - Pick Up Gun

Background tiles: https://cjtouhey.itch.io/horror-school-japanese-style-tile-palette-for-unity-or-...
